document.full_text: li na became the first person from asia to win a singles grand slam title after beating francesca schiavone of italy 6-4, 7-6 at roland garros in paris on saturday.
document.title: li na wins french open final
lines_and_colors: li na became the first person from asia to win a singles grand slam title after beating francesca schiavone of italy 6-4, 7-6 at roland garros in paris on saturday.
